sections.heading: (MBCA 7.41) A shareholder may not commence or maintain a derivative proceeding unless the shareholder:(1) Was a shareholder of the corporation at the time of the act or omission complained of or became a shareholder through transfer by operation of law from one who was a shareholder at that time; an
sections.text: (MBCA 7.41) A shareholder may not commence or maintain a derivative proceeding unless the shareholder:(1) Was a shareholder of the corporation at the time of the act or omission complained of or became a shareholder through transfer by operation of law from one who was a shareholder at that time; and(2) Fairly and adequately represents the interests of the corporation in enforcing the right of the corporation.SourceLaws 2014, LB749, ยง 76.
